column4: Excpectations

column3: ANALYST/ COORDINATOR/ STAFF ACCOUNTANT/ OFFICE MANAGER
column4: Takes ownership of responsibilities with guidance from manager.
Begins to think ahead and anticipates manager’s needs.

column3: ANALYST/ COORDINATOR/ STAFF ACCOUNTANT/ OFFICE MANAGER
column4: Impact or value-add is primarily due to day-to-day operational impact.
Prepares work products.

column3: ANALYST/ COORDINATOR/ STAFF ACCOUNTANT/ OFFICE MANAGER
column4: Owns day-to-day tasks within a workstream.

column3: ANALYST/ COORDINATOR/ STAFF ACCOUNTANT/ OFFICE MANAGER
column4: Proactively offers manager and team members support to complete critical work efforts.

column3: ANALYST/ COORDINATOR/ STAFF ACCOUNTANT/ OFFICE MANAGER
column4: Accurately predicts time needed to complete a task and consistently meets deadlines.

column3: ANALYST/ COORDINATOR/ STAFF ACCOUNTANT/ OFFICE MANAGER
column4: Acts as a self-reviewer to produce accurate and complete work products.

column3: ANALYST/ COORDINATOR/ STAFF ACCOUNTANT/ OFFICE MANAGER
column4: Expresses ideas clearly and concisely in both writing and live interactions.
Seeks opportunities to voice point of view in group settings.

column3: ANALYST/ COORDINATOR/ STAFF ACCOUNTANT/ OFFICE MANAGER
column4: Demonstrates ability to analyze, synthesize, and present large amounts of data with accuracy and efficiency according to agreed parameters and deadlines.
Works with manager to expand internal and external networks to build knowledge and technical expertise in one area of specialization or expertise.
Proactively seeks to take on more responsibilities to expand knowledge, stretch beyond comfort zone, and support broader team efforts.
Sets and achieves challenging stretch goals that support team and business area goals.
Revisits and amends goals with manager to ensure expectations are clear, taking into account changes in priorities/business environment.
Demonstrates strong commitment to the mission and values of the firm.
Beginning to establish open and trusting relationships with other teams through regular and productive communication.
Looks for opportunities to expand internal network.
Shares best practices with peers to improve workplace efficiencies.
Leverages experience to identify the root causes of problems and recommends solutions.
Contributes to the development and implementation of new or improved processes and systems.
Building the confidence to share ideas, provide constructive feedback, and challenge the status quo when communicating with colleagues.
Leverages prior experience to improve future work products.
Applies firmwide compliance standards across all work and elevates issues to appropriate point of contact.
Educates self about how unconscious bias can impact behavior.
Leverages personal network to collaborate across teams and support work efforts.
Proactively solicits and leverages the perspectives of a broad range of internal and/or external stakeholders.
Takes steps to expand diversity of thought for self.
